name: Search for user tweets on Twitter
description:
The field Object ID is treated as the username. Simply add and select new nodes, login to Twitter and fetch data. 

Gives back the N=count-value (currently 10, max. 200) Tweets of the User.


For information about user_timeline parameters see https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1/get/statuses/user_timeline

For information on the returned data see 
https://dev.twitter.com/docs/platform-objects/tweets
